about:
✔ Hi, my name is Natalie, I'm from Russia. I work as a professional UX/UI designer for 7 years now.
  ☑ I'm constantly improving my skills, learning new trends, programs.
  ☑ I specialize in UX-design of websites, applications and logos.
  ☑ I work in Adobe Photoshop, Adobe illustrator and Figma.
  ✔✔✔ I make stunning and thoughtful designs for businesses that have good conversion rates.
  Every new project from scratch is a new challenge.
  Ready to work on 1 to 1 projects and compete.

about:
Welcome to my profile. My name is Szekeres László and I'm a graphic designer, with many years of experience. I live in the beautiful city of Oradea, Romania, with my even more beautiful wife, Henrietta:). My "designer career" started when I was 4 and I drew tons of cows and horses..^^ Since then I developed my ability, until graphic design became my passion and my job as well.
  If you like my works and you are interested in logo or stationary design, feel free to contact me.

about: Most of my focus is on providing digital design and branding solutions, which is something i did for the past 3 years. I'm always trying new things and exploring all aspects of digital art and creative experiments. I worked with a diverse range of clients from a multitude of global startups. My goal for any project is to form a relationship with the client in order to find the best visual design solution that serves their needs and promotes their business to a wide audience.

about: I am a creative professional with a long career in graphic design, art direction, creative direction. After working for several small Atlanta design firms, I worked for a company that was, at the time, the largest creative group in the Southeast. Subsequently, I started my own design firm which, over the years, received numerous honors and awards for its design work. Next I served as the Creative Services Manager for Randstad, a global staffing firm. I now work as a freelance graphic designer.

about:
Hi,
  I’m Thao, a Designer & Illustrator.
  I knew I loved drawing after I had attended a lettering class at my primary school. What I didn't realize until much later was that I could do something I loved and get paid at the same time, while also helping others. I came back to drawing and eventually started learning graphic design in the summer of 2019, right after getting my degree in foreign languages.
  I love it, and I can't wait to design a gorgeous logo for you.

about: Venezuelan graphic designer with a conceptualist and minimalist approach. I like to create simple designs. I try to play with the names and concentrate the essence of the message in a simple piece. My portfolio is a sample of the trend I am following.
